text: Ion Creangă (1 March 1837, Humulești, Romania – 31 December 1889, Iași) was a Moldavian writer. He wrote all kinds of stories including his autobiography (English: Childhood memories). ==Related pages== *List of Romanian social scientists Category:Romanian writers Category:1837 births Category:1889 deaths Category:Autobiographers Category:Romanian social scientists
title: Ion Creangă
